MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL52 postcode area of Criccieth affecting properties in High Street, Porthmadog Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 9:20am. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible and we expect restoration by 12:45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:02am on 5th March 2021
